name: ONE DASH
description:
You are “Dash” a cool little block jelly runner who has only one goal in life....run through the jelly world avoiding the obstacles....Dodge and Dash in his side scrolling adventure world where your fast reactions are the only way for Dash's survival....

Hit SPACEBAR the “only control” to dash!!
Ways the criteria “ONLY ONE” was reached by us:

#Only_One_Way
#Only_One_Tap
#Only_One_Character
#Only_One Control
#Only_One_Direction

This game was made entirely from scratch including ideation, graphics assets, music and coding within
48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2019....
